ðŸ“– Summary: Sokuji is a live speech translation application that uses AI to bridge language barriers in real-time. It is available as a desktop application built with Electron and React, and as a browser extension for Chrome and Edge. Sokuji offers audio routing and virtual device management for seamless integration with other applications.
